occupation: AI and Big Data Solution Architect at Hewlett Packard Enterprise
headline: AI and Big Data Solution Architect at HPE
summary:
Working as Data Engineer and Data Scientist for more than 8 years.
• Engaging in on-site projects proving the use of AWS services to support new distributed computing. Engagements includes migration of existing applications and development of new applications using AWS cloud services
• Experience with building data pipelines and applications to stream and process datasets at low latencies on AWS, Azure and GCP cloud.
• Responsible in dealing with structured, semi-structured and unstructured data in batch and real-time environments.
• Experience with DevOps, code deployment processes, microservices, and serverless architectures.
• Responsible for modeling complex problems, discovering insights and identifying opportunities using statistical, algorithmic, mining using python, R language.

experiences.title: AI and Big Data Solution Architect
Sr. Data Analyst
experiences.description:
Applied technical skills using Python, SAS and SQL in data collection, data analysis and reporting to procure data from database structures to report and provide solutions to client requests in a timely manner.
• Worked with code management tooling such as Github / Gitlab.
• Develop CI/CD pipeline tooling and deployments using bamboo/Jenkins.
• Responsible for creating project plan and experienced scrum methodologies and agile practices

experiences.title: Data Science Intern
experiences.description:
Develop predictive models to determine a consumer’s propensity to commit an action towards FCCI products through the various offline and online channels using linear and logistic regression in R, SAS.
• Experience in designing rich data visualization to communicate to customers or management.
• Handle complex datasets, build classification models for predictions & forecasting based on the training data using Machine learning (Random Forest, Regression, Clustering).
• Proficiency with Python. Experience with deep learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, Theano, Keras, Pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn
• Experience in dealing with Apache Hadoop component like HDFS, MapReduce and Hive.

experiences.title: Business Intelligence Analyst
experiences.description: Over 3 years of solid SAS programming experience in developing applications, data warehousing, statistical analysis and report generation using SAS 9.x and SAS 8.x.\n\u2022 Developed regression models (including generalized linear models and gradient boosting machines) to predict risk using driving characteristics and behaviors in support of usage-based insurance.\n\u2022 Worked in the Insurance field gathered and analyzed business requirements and produced specification documents for new project requests. Developed ad-hoc queries and reports for clients and provide analytical support and recommendation as necessary. Acted as liaison between business unit and report developer to develop, communicate and modify existing report.

accomplishment_projects.title: Insurance claim Fraud Detection (Python, Tableau)
accomplishment_projects.description: Build the model using different machine learning algorithm like Logistic regression, Support vector machine and decision trees to predict the fraud cases.

accomplishment_projects.title: Movie Recommendation System (R, SAS, Tableau)
accomplishment_projects.description: Created movie recommendation system using Collaborative Filtering Algorithm that suggests new movies to watch from a large dataset based on user\u2019s past ratings of watched   movies

accomplishment_projects.title: Online Food Ordering System \u2013 GRUBHUB
accomplishment_projects.description: The project aim is to engage customers with the nearby restaurants and hence save the customers from the tedious task of visiting restaurant to buy food. Applied 6S process to the current process to standardized the process. Our goal was to reach the near perfection in performance improvement.

accomplishment_projects.title: Report on analysis of Aircraft Crashes (R language, Tableau, MS excel)
accomplishment_projects.description: Air craft crashes are one of the most dangerous and mysterious mishaps. Identifying cause and casualties and more over take preventive measures were the biggest challenges of the project. Built Logistic Regression, Na\u00efve Bayes, RBF & Neural Network model on Aircraft dataset from scratch tuning their meta-parameters to explore, find, and argue which model is best suited.

accomplishment_projects.title: Statistical Data Mining on Effect of law on causalities in Road Accidents (R language, Python, MS excel)
accomplishment_projects.description: Worked on a data set which has 192 data points. The objective of this project is to do predictive analysis, I have applied recursive partitioning and regression methods to forecast of number of deaths/injuries for month.

accomplishment_projects.title: Watson Analytics for Cyber Security in Financial Industry
accomplishment_projects.description: Worked with a financial institution to identify anomalies behavior for accounts which were hacked. Starting from decision tree to decide which variables are the most important, built the logistics regression based model and suggested the ways identify the possible cyber-security breaches in various operational transactions.

certifications.name: SAS Certified Base Programmer for SAS 9
Advanced Analytics In R For Data Science
SAS Certified Statistical Business Analyst Using SAS 9: Regression and Modeling
